General course objectives:
General course objectives
The aim is to introduce new trends in the areas of image and video coding and communication.
Learning objectives:
A student who has met the objectives of the course will be able to:
analyse image coding models
explain multi-resolution coding of images
explain advanced motion compensation and rate-control in video coding
explain interaction between communication networks and image and video coding
develop advanced image and video coding techniques
simulate image or video coding
apply new image and video coding methods, e.g. for multi camera video
optimize image and video coding methods
apply machine learning in image and video coding
Content: The topics covered are new methods for optimization of entropy coding, cross-entropy, machine learning in image coding, wavelet and multi-resolution coding of multi-dimensional image data, interplay between communication networks and image/video coding, advanced video coding, high imae and video color quality, distributed coding, multi camera and multiview coding.
Remarks: This course is also suitable as part of a Ph.D. study plan
